statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ -3 \\ -2 \\ 3 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 2 \\ 2 \\ -1 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -9 \\ -6 \\ 9 \\ -9 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 19 \\ 14 \\ -17 \\ 21 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
